          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat conduction in metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeübertragung in den Metallen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduction de la chaleur en métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Condução do calor nos metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conduzione di calore in metalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεξαγωγή θερμότητας στα μέταλλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conducción del calor en metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows how heat is conducted through free electrons in metals.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction electrons</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Hitze durch freie 
Elektronen in den Metallen geleitet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre comment la chaleur est 
conduite par les électrons libres en métaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra como o calor é conduzido 
através dos elétrons livres nos metais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra come il calore è condotto 
attraverso gli elettroni liberi in metalli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός επιδεικνύει πώς η θερμότητα 
διευθύνεται μέσω των ελεύθερων ηλεκτρονίων στα μέταλλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra cómo el calor se conduce a 
través de electrones libres en metales.</string>
